Title: COUPS, BIAFRA, INSECURITY: Nigeria won Civil War but didn’t know how to win peace – Gen Alabi-Isama (rtd)
Summary: Brigadier General Godwin Alabi-Isama (retired) was one of the top players in the military during the Nigerian Civil War, also known as Biafra War . •‘Why people give more information to B/Haram than to Federal Government’ •Says whoever does not want state police is

Title: Tight race expected in Portugal’s presidential election on Sunday
Summary: Of the 11 candidates standing, André Ventura, António José Seguro, and João Cotrim de Figueiredo have the best chances of reaching the run-off .

Title: Why power supply to FCT Water Board was disconnected – AEDC
Summary: Abuja Electricity Distribution Plc (AEDC) disconnected electricity supply to FCT Water Board . The agency's failure to settle electricity bills accumulated over more than one year . AEDC disclosed this in a statement issued on Saturday by its Head of Brand Marketing .

Title: US kills terrorist leader linked to attack on American troops in Syria
Summary: US kills 'experienced terrorist leader' linked to December attack that killed two U.S. soldiers and interpreter . Two Americans were killed in the December attack on American troops in Syria .

Title: AFCON 2025: Nwabali credits collective effort for Eagles’ third-place finish
Summary: Stanley Nwabali credits collective effort for Eagles’ AFCON 2025 bronze medal win . Super Eagles goalkeeper describes Nigeria’s third-place finish as a product of collective effort . He said his penalty saves sealed victory over Egypt .
